verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> reigns! <S%H4427><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice! <S%H1523><s%> Let the multitude <S%H7227><s%> of islands <S%H339><s%> be glad! <S%H8055><s%>
Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and darkness <S%H6205><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> him. <S%H6664><s%> Righteousness and justice <S%H4941><s%> are the foundation <S%H4349><s%> of his throne. <S%H3678><s%>
A fire <S%H784><s%> goes <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H3857><s%> and burns up his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> on every side. <S%H5439><s%>
His lightning <S%H1300><s%> lights <S%H215><s%> up the world. <S%H8398><s%> The earth <S%H8398><s%> sees, <S%H7200><s%> and trembles. <S%H2342><s%>

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> melt <S%H4549><s%> like wax <S%H1749><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole earth. <S%H776><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> All the peoples <S%H5971><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> his glory. <S%H3519><s%>
Let all them be shamed <S%H954><s%> who serve <S%H5647><s%> engraved images, <S%H6459><s%> who boast <S%H1984><s%> in their idols. <S%H457><s%> Worship <S%H7812><s%> him, <S%H430><s%> all you gods!

Zion <S%H6726><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> and was glad. <S%H8055><s%> The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoiced, <S%H1523><s%> because of your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
For you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, are most high above <S%H5945><s%> all the earth. <S%H776><s%> You are exalted <S%H5927><s%> far above <S%H3966><s%> all gods. <S%H430><s%>

You who love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%> He preserves <S%H8104><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his saints. <S%H2623><s%> He delivers <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Light <S%H216><s%> is sown <S%H2232><s%> for the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and gladness <S%H8057><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you righteous <S%H6662><s%> people! <S%H3034><s%> Give thanks to his holy <S%H6944><s%> Name. <S%H2143><s%>
